price: Wanawapelekea yale wanayo yasikia; na wengi wao ni waongo.
footnotes: Hao hutega masikio yao kwa Mashetani, na kwao wakapata mambo ya dhana dhana tu. Na wengi wao ni waongo, na huzidisha tena juu ya kauli walizo zipata kwa Mashetani.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
